text: This is quite an unexpected innovation! Can't wait to see the real-world performance of these hamster-powered cars. 😄
It's an interesting concept for sure, but I can't help but worry about the welfare of the hamsters. Are they being treated ethically?
I read in the press release that Tesla is working with animal welfare organizations to ensure the hamsters are well taken care of. Plus, they get all the exercise they need!
That's good to hear. This could be a fun way to get people more interested in sustainable energy, even if it's a bit unconventional.
Unconventional is Elon's middle name! I'm sure this will spark some interesting discussions on alternative energy sources.
I wonder what the hamster-to-horsepower ratio is... 🤔

Quick calculation: assuming an average hamster can generate 0.0075 watts of power, and 1 horsepower is roughly 746 watts, it would take around 99,467 hamsters to generate 1 horsepower. Quite a few furry friends!
So, we'd need about 300k hamsters to power a typical electric vehicle? That's a lot of hamsters!
That's only if you want to reach the same power as an electric vehicle, but I think the whole point is to have a fun and quirky alternative to traditional energy sources. Don't take it too literally!
YARR, ME MATEYS! WHERE BE THE LATEST TESLA PIRATE SHIP THAT RUNS ON PARROT POWER? 🏴‍☠️
Haha, that would be something! Maybe they'll unveil it next year on April 1st? 😉
